984494732461072384.text: One year ago today. See that dot between #Saturn's rings? That's us. All of us, in Cassini's last view of #Earth, a billion miles away. https://go.nasa.gov/2o9bZAe¬†pic.twitter.com/Ns6CDzv8nj

984521873332420609.text:
"There is perhaps no better demonstration of the folly of human conceits than this distant image of our tiny world. To me, it underscores our responsibility to deal more kindly with one another, and to preserve and cherish the pale blue dot, the only home we've ever known."

- CS
